document_data.name: Arlaenga
document_data.mainbody: '''Arlaenga''' was one of the servants in Lord [[Marsten]]'s hunting lodge.
document_data.History: Arlaenga was the head maid for Lord Marsten until, some time before the [[Tyranny of Dragons]], her master was killed and the lodge occupied by [[Cult of the Dragon]] agents under [[Talis Kasterel]]. She decided to use Arlaenga and the other servants as her own. Arlaenga hoped to show her loyalty to the new masters by spying on things she found suspicious.
